title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and embed via npm package ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat history, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible API endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI that lets you browse, pull, and chat with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, stream, pull, list, and delete models.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Redis, and Nginx for easy self-hosted deployment.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision models, fine-tuning, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, streaming, and embeddings; compatible with Blazor and ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; chat, pull, and list models from Ruby or Rails apps.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes, Q&A, and auto-completion.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed and systemd service.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; chat, stream, pull, and delete models from Go applications.
